last_episode_to_air.name: Christmas in Beverly Hills
last_episode_to_air.overview: Shanique meets with realtor Josh Altman, who gives her a dose of true tea and Kendra breaks the news to Hobart that she is going back to work full time.

name: Married to Medicine Los Angeles
overview: A look into the elite and fast paced lives of five successful women, including doctors and doctor's wives living in Los Angeles. With an incredibly small and exclusive African American medical community to lean on, these women share a special bond.

episodes.name: ATL in La La Land
episodes.overview: Quad, Dr. Heavenly and Dr. Simone travel to Los Angeles to visit Contessa's army buddy, Dr. Britten Cole; Contessa is ready to show off her body; Quad wants a break from all the drama surrounding her divorce, and Heavenly is up for a girl's trip.

episodes.name: Ghost of Girlfriends Past
episodes.overview: Asha tries to get her reluctant husband on the baby train while Imani considers reconnecting with her biological father. Later, Shanique throws her hubby an epic birthday bash, but tensions brew when an ex-girlfriend makes an unexpected appearance.

episodes.name: Jazzy's Dollhouse Brunch
episodes.overview: Robert reveals shocking new information to Shanique about Asha and Larry, who are busy planning for a family. Later, the ladies attend a party at Jazmin's Beverly Hills mansion, leading some to question how she can afford her lifestyle.

episodes.name: Truth Bombs
episodes.overview: Britten is faced with an ultimatum from Mack. Meanwhile, Dr. Imani throws a Truth, Trust and Transparency party to finally settle the drama between Shanique and Asha, but new revelations threaten to split the friendship circle wide open.

episodes.name: The Roof Is on Fire
episodes.overview: Shanique makes outrageous claims about Asha's husband, leading to an epic argument. Then, Jazmin faces off with Imani about her drug dealer comments. Britten goes house hunting, while Noelle questions if she made the right choice of school for Gabby.

episodes.name: Defective Crystal Ball
episodes.overview: Britten's mission hits a snag as her husband reaches his breaking point, and Imani's mother gives her some hard truths about her father. Meanwhile, the women take part in a psychic reading, and no one is ready for what the spirit world has to say.

episodes.name: Dog Tags of Summer
episodes.overview: The women come back to earth after their psychic reading goes off book, leading them to suspect Noelle of masterminding it. Plus, Imani sees her half-sister for the first time, Britten hosts a pool party, and Shanique and Robert fight over her work.

episodes.name: A Bond That Will Never Be Broken
episodes.overview: Britten has to make a difficult decision that has repercussions for everyone; Robert throws a surprise dinner for Shanique; Asha updates Noelle on her potential pregnancy; Imani reunites with her long-lost sister; Imani throws a rooftop event.

episodes.name: Going Going Back Back to Cali
episodes.overview: Contessa, Heavenly, Quad and Toya, return to the city of Angels for a girls weekend getaway. Jazmin sets the ladies up in her new luxury Hollywood Hills villa, planning an action packed weekend through her concierge business.

episodes.name: Prepare for Backlash
episodes.overview: Last call at Jazmin's cocktail party brings a surprising resolution between her and former nemesis Imani; with Britten's best friend Contessa and her ATL friends in town.

episodes.name: Housewarming Home Wreckers
episodes.overview: Britten & Kendra bond over their biracial backgrounds. Shanique blindsides Robert with her desire for a life change. Jazmin struggles to forgive Imani for their beef last year, while Imani confronts rumors about her husband. Kendra is excited to show off her new home but isn’t prepared for a messy showdown.

episodes.name: Hollywood Night of Terror
episodes.overview: It's Halloween in the city of Angels. Britten, Mack and the Kids experience their first LA trick-or-treat theatrics. Kendra gives Hobart a fright when she gives him news that may upend their lives. Imani is haunted by her wedding anniversary. Shanique scores VIP tickets to the spookiest hayride in the city, but the outing turns into a nightmare when she butts heads with uninvited Lia.

episodes.name: Homecoming Queens
episodes.overview: Kendra seeks to mend Shanique and Lia’s friendship; as Kendra’s fitness coach, Jazmin raids her kitchen; Imani and Britten meet up with Contessa for Xavier’s homecoming weekend; Imani opens up about her dark past and relationship struggles.

episodes.name: From Taking Notes to White Coats
episodes.overview: In New Orleans Britten, Imani and Contessa are down for their HBCU's homecoming weekend, but sense something is up with Imani. Kendra, Jaz, and Shanique’s world gets turned upside down as they try their hands at Aerial Yoga.

episodes.name: Straight Outta Beverly Hills
episodes.overview: Imani reveals the devastating truth about her marriage to Britten. Robert surprises Shanique with a birthday party at the ranch but things get messy when the ladies question Jazmin's fitness coaching abilities.

episodes.name: Sis-Cation
episodes.overview: After Imani's shocking divorce reveal, the ladies rally around her and head to Palm Springs; Kendra is nervous for her first trip without her baby; Jazmin and Lia are ready to turn it up, causing things to get wild on the bus ride.

episodes.name: Queens  of the desert
episodes.overview: The Palm Springs weekend continues as the ladies hit the town for a social cycle, but Kendra and Jazmin’s fitness relationship threatens everyone's good time.

episodes.name: Christmas in Beverly Hills
episodes.overview: Shanique meets with realtor Josh Altman, who gives her a dose of true tea and Kendra breaks the news to Hobart that she is going back to work full time.
